text: Vincent James McMahon (better known as Vince McMahon, Sr., (July 6, 1914 â€“ May 24, 1984) was a U.S. professional wrestling promoter. He is best known for founding the American promotion, Capitol Wrestling Corporation (now known as WWE), of which his son, Vincent Kennedy McMahon, was the Chairman of the Board of Directors from 1980 to 2024. == References == Category:1914 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:People from Harlem Category:Professional wrestling promoters Category:WWE people Category:WWE Hall of Fame
title: Vincent J. McMahon
